class.name: ClassDB
class.description: Provides access to metadata stored for every available class.

method.name: can_instance
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if you can instance objects from the specified 'class', [code]false[/code] in other case.

method.name: class_exists
method.description: Returns whether the specified 'class' is available or not.

method.name: class_get_category
method.description: Returns a category associated with the class for use in documentation and the Asset Library. Debug mode required.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant
method.description: Returns the value of the integer constant 'name' of 'class' or its ancestry. Always returns 0 when the constant could not be found.

method.name: class_get_integer_constant_list
method.description: Returns an array with the names all the integer constants of 'class' or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_method_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the methods of 'class' or its ancestry if 'no_inheritance' is [code]false[/code]. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary] with the following keys: args, default_args, flags, id, name, return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage).

method.name: class_get_property
method.description: Returns the value of 'property' of 'class' or its ancestry.

method.name: class_get_property_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the properties of 'class' or its ancestry if 'no_inheritance' is [code]false[/code].

method.name: class_get_signal
method.description: Returns the 'signal' data of 'class' or its ancestry. The returned value is a [Dictionary] with the following keys: args, default_args, flags, id, name, return: (class_name, hint, hint_string, name, type, usage).

method.name: class_get_signal_list
method.description: Returns an array with all the signals of 'class' or its ancestry if 'no_inheritance' is [code]false[/code]. Every element of the array is a [Dictionary] as described in [method class_get_signal].

method.name: class_has_integer_constant
method.description: Returns whether 'class' or its ancestry has an integer constant called 'name' or not.

method.name: class_has_method
method.description: Returns whether 'class' (or its ancestry if 'no_inheritance' is false) has a method called 'method' or not.

method.name: class_has_signal
method.description: Returns whether 'class' or its ancestry has a signal called 'signal' or not.

method.name: class_set_property
method.description: Sets 'property' value of 'class' to 'value'.

method.name: get_class_list
method.description: Returns the names of all the classes available.

method.name: get_inheriters_from_class
method.description: Returns the names of all the classes that directly or indirectly inherit from 'class'.

method.name: get_parent_class
method.description: Returns the parent class of 'class'.

method.name: instance
method.description: Creates an instance of 'class'.

method.name: is_class_enabled
method.description: Returns whether this class is enabled or not.

method.name: is_parent_class
method.description: Returns whether 'inherits' is an ancestor of 'class' or not.
